You reach out and place your hands on the black orb, concentrating deeply as you do so. You feel your mind escaping from your body, flowing into the black orb. Like stepping out of a portal, you find yourself in the gnome caverns of Mount Nevermind. A committee of gnomes is here examining and commenting rapidly on some nearby inventions. Your vision becomes blurry, and you return to your body with a jerk, instinctively removing your hands from the orb.
